p: The closure in ECCOv4 for the 20‐year average of the BV terms in equation (3) is illustrated in Figure 1. Individual terms are of order ±10 −9 m s −1 and the residual has magnitude of less than ±10 −12 m/s. For 36% of the ocean the residual is ≪1% (Figure 1). This small residual permits going forward with confidence. Some numerical issues do exist on the continental shelf and in shallow water generally, but these regions only amount to 3% of the area of the global ocean and will be ignored.
